subwelcome: We are a team creating open source projects

about.title: About us
about.text: We are a team of programmers specializing in open-source projects. This allows us to gain new experiences and share knowledge with each other. We are open to any technology!
about.text2: Special thanks to JetBrains, Sentry.io and Jira Software for providing open-source licenses to our team members. We would also like to express our gratitude to GitHub for providing high-quality software for managing Git repositories.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.text: Here you will find answers to the most frequently asked questions

question1.question: What is EternalCodeTeam?
question1.answer: EternalCodeTeam is a team of programmers who create open-source projects. We are open to any technology!

question2.question: How can I join the team?
question2.answer: You can join the team by contacting us via Discord

question3.question: What are the benefits of joining the team?
question3.answer: By joining the team, you will gain new experiences and you will be able to share your knowledge with other team members.

question4.question: What are the requirements to join the team?
question4.answer: You must have basic knowledge of programming.

features.title: What do we do?
features.text: Below you will find information about what we do on a daily basis.

text1.title: Java
text1.text: Java is definitely our favorite programming language. We have already created many projects in Java!

text2.title: Linux
text2.text: We like to work on operating systems based on the Linux kernel.

text3.title: Other technologies
text3.text: We are open to learning about new technologies and are eager to learn them!
